prompt:
Translate the following subtitles into Vietnamese. 

Please PRESERVE ALL the original timestamps for EACH ENTRY.

Subtitles to process:
[
  {
    "start": "00:00:00,000",
    "end": "00:00:01,100",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "Okay,"
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:01,100",
    "end": "00:00:03,300",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "this is our breakfast."
  }
]

ONLY and ALWAYS return a valid JSON back:
```json
[
  {
    "start": "timestamp",
    "end": "timestamp",
    "vi": "Vietnamese text"
  }
]
```

response.vi: đây là bữa sáng của chúng ta.
